issue.title: [Python] Don't double-package plasma-store-server
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10302](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10302). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is part of the `arrow-cpp` and `pyarrow` conda packages. We shouldn't ship the version in `pyarrow` as this is just a copy to a different location.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10302?focusedCommentId=17219460) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8458
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8458>
